RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 5F Turf CR: 67. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MCGOLDEN stalked the pace chasing to upper stretch rallying up late between horses. MR MAYHEM raced evenly off the pace coming six wide down the lane surging late. RED GUN raced evenly through the turn vying three path down the lane responding gamely late. PAPA DEL CIELO broke sharply setting a clear pace into upper stretch angling out there faltering late. BOOYAH raced evenly needing more. FINLANDIAS NEAT played no factor. WILLIAM'S CAUSE was never involved. PEINADITO was always outrun. TEAM LUCKYTOBALIVE struggled far back.

ENTRY.COMMENT: struggled far back

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 7F Turf CR: 84. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 5 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FULL OF LUCK (CHI) rallied on the far turn angling out cutting off rival in the process mid stretch surging up from the six path late. UNBRIDLEDSELECTION stalked the pace rallying to duel in upper stretch battling to the wire in the four path. MASKED away alertly set the pace through the far turn being hooked in upper stretch bearing in jamming foe late while staying on to the wire. ESTILO VARONIL stalked the pace dueling along the inside in upper stretch being jammed late steadying at the rail. SELLING OUT slow early raced three path down the lane gaining late. REUX (GB) slow early lost ground to upper stretch finishing evenly eight wide. GOTTAGETITBACK stalked the pace to upper stretch losing path in mod stretch having to steady near mid track. HARD N'SWEET gave a prompted middle move then shied out while weakening in mid stretch. PIONEER DANCER was never involved racing nine wide down the lane. MR. MAGICO was always outrun racing ten wide through the lane, FOLLOWING AN OBJECTION FULL OF LUCK WAS DISQUALIFIED AND PLACED SEVENTH FOR INTERFERENCE WITH GOTTAGETITBACK IN MID STRETCH.

ENTRY.NAME: Selling Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, three path lane, gained late

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Magico
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lost ground to lane, finished evenly 8 wide,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 5 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TORIANNE off slowly was well back through the turn racing inside to upper stretch angling four wide in mid stretch rallying pat weary rivals to win clear. MY BATON ROUGE set the pace through the turn digging in near the rail down the lane becoming leg weary late being run down in the final yards. LADY OCEAN stalked the pace chasing to upper stretch weakening late. CONSTITUTIONALIST gave a mild rally on the turn finishing evenly. PRINCESS TERESKA faded on the turn. CANDYWRAPPER CRAZY losing action was eased in upper stretch making the wire walking off after the race.

ENTRY.COMMENT: lost action, eased lane, made wire, walked off

Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 5 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,00 0 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRST HOMESTEAD measured against pressing rival on the front end edging clear on the far turn using enough to hold clear. BALTIC FLEET sent hard pressed on the inside chasing through the far turn extending down proving no match for winner. KANTPAYTHETOLL gave a prompted middle move chasing to upper stretch holding position there. CHOPPED gained on the far turn then raced evenly down the lane. OPEN OUT played no factor. COLAVITO stalked the early pace fading on the far turn. VOLTE FACE trailed throughout.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4000 OR LESS IN 2022-2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 5 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MYRRH stalked the pace pressing clear on the turn extending down the lane finding more in the four path. LATER DAYS set the pace being passed on the turn vying from the rail in upper stretch proving no match for the winner hanging on for place. ORBIT MARS raced evenly through into upper stretch finding best action late. GO STELLAIRE slow early lagged to lane responding late to finish well in the three path. COWGIRL KIMMIE slow early lost ground to upper stretch entering the picture late seven wide. MIZZEN chased through the turn weakening in upper stretch.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: RED HURRICANE pressed abreast rival through the turn shaking clear in upper stretch holding under a drive. SOUTHERN SENSE slow early circled out on the turn coming seven wide in upper stretch rallying late to save place. KREWE CHIEF pressed bid on the turn coming five wide in upper stretch finishing evenly near mid track. PRETTY STORMY chased the pace extending into upper stretch weakening late. BEASTFROMTHEEAST slow early passed a few down the lane. HIDDEN RULER hustled along pursued to the quarter pole then faded in upper stretch. SAG HARBOR was never involved. ROYAL SQUEEZE pressed the pace through the turn wearing out along the inside in upper stretch.

APPRAISAL rallied on the far turn drawing even abreast rival in upper stretch matching strides to the wire just missing. ESCAPE VELOCITY slow early rallied on the far turn vying evenly down the lane. HIGH ROLLING DUDE raced evenly chasing to upper stretch holding off the others late. HEZA HANDFUL gave a prompted middle move chasing on the far turn weakening in upper stretch. HOBE SOUND hustled along pursued to the far turn fading into upper stretch. STORIED FELLA stalked through the far turn tiring down the lane.
